description: Defines the content for each unit of a Trail. Content fields are (from top to bottom of rendered page): intro, video, template, quiz, outro. Files can be added via (ordered by load time): mixin, css, script, <render content>, onload
name: Page

fields.description: URL of javascript file containing script or Angular component to add (filter, controller, service, directive, factory, provider, etc.). Will only be downloaded once. Angular components must be prefixed Application.Extensions.___ .... Will be added to the stack before the Page and relevant controllers are instantiated.
fields.name: mixin

fields.description: HTML to display at bottom of Page content
fields.name: outro

fields.description: URL of CSS to be downloaded, will only be downloaded one time and before Page is instantiated.
fields.name: css

fields.description: object with keyvals which will extend the Angular Scope, and therefore be used for templating (so all HTML, templates, and quizzes can use the dictionary)
fields.name: dictionary

fields.description: HTML to display at top of Page content
fields.name: intro

fields.description: URL of javascript file containing a script to to execute before the Page loads. Will be executed every time the Page is loaded.
fields.name: script

fields.description: YouTube VideoID or link to Youtube video. Can also be an object, where: obj.id is the ID or link to the YouTube video, obj.params is an object as defined by the YouTube iFrame API, obj.mini dictates whether the video starts in small form, and obj.autoplay dictates whether the video should play immediately
fields.name: video

fields.description: URL of javascript file to be executed after the Page has loaded and been inserted into the DOM.
fields.name: onload

fields.description: text to display as a hint
fields.name: hint

fields.description: icon to use for Trail sidenav
fields.name: icon

fields.description: Name of controller to apply for whole Page (all content components) - must already be included (e.g. via mixin())
fields.name: controller
